Needs summary: Ticket number generation (sequential, per-queue or global); Multi-counter/window support (A1-A99, B1-B99 for different service types); Digital display screen showing: current number being served, next numbers up, estimated wait time; Customer-facing ticket with: their number, estimated wait, position in line, QR code for status tracking; SMS/app notifications when number approaching (\"You're 3 away\"); \"Now Serving\" audio announcement integration; Estimated wait time calculation based on: average service time per counter, numbers ahead, current queue depth; Service type routing (Counter A for simple tasks, Counter B for complex); Recall number if customer missed (hold for X minutes, then skip); data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
